Class StudentRegisteredCourses

java.lang.Object
stars.entity.StudentRegisteredCourses
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class StudentRegisteredCourses
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
In charge of the handling the Courses registered by the Student

    • getIndexList

      public java.util.ArrayList<Index> getIndexList()
      Gets a merged list of both the list of Indexes from confirmed courses that the Student has registered for and the waitlist courses that the Student is in
      Returns:
      An ArrayList consisting of the combined list of both the Indexes under confirmed courses and waitlist courses

      public Student getOwner()

    • addIndex

      public boolean addIndex​(Index index) throws ExceedAUException, TimetableClashException, AlreadyRegisteredException
      Adds Index to StudentRegisteredCourses and adds Student to the Index
      Parameters:
      index - The Index to be added
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates false if the Student has been added to the waitlist of the Index or true if the confirmed list of the Index
      Throws:
      ExceedAUException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because it would exceed the AU limit
      TimetableClashException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because of a Timetable Clash between te Index and the Student's exisiting Indexes
      AlreadyRegisteredException - If the user is unable to add the Index because he has already Registered for the Course

    • dropIndex

      public boolean dropIndex​(Index index)
      Drops the Index from StudentRegisteredCourses and drops Student from the Index
      Parameters:
      index - The Index to be dropped
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates whether Index has been dropped from StudentRegisteredCourses and from the Index

    • changeIndex

      public boolean changeIndex​(Index oldIndex, Index newIndex) throws ExceedAUException, TimetableClashException, AlreadyRegisteredException
      Changes the Index for a Student to another Index of the same Course. This change is also reflected in both Indexes
      Parameters:
      oldIndex - The current Index of the Student
      newIndex - The new Index of the Student
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates whether the Student has been added to the Waitlist of the Index or the Confirmed list of the Index
      Throws:
      ExceedAUException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because it would exceed the AU limit
      TimetableClashException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because of a Timetable Clash between te Index and the Student's existing Indexes
      AlreadyRegisteredException - If the user is unable to add the Index because he has already Registered for the Course

    • swopPlaces

      public boolean swopPlaces​(Index friendIndex, Student friend) throws TimetableClashException, AlreadyRegisteredException
      Swaps the Index of a Student with the Index of another Student in the same Course. This wil be reflected in both Students and both Indexes
      Parameters:
      friendIndex - The Index of the other Student in the same Course
      friend - The other Student
      Returns:
      boolean that indicates true if the current Student has been swopped to the Confirmed list of the other person's Index or false if the Waitlist of the other person's Index
      Throws:
      TimetableClashException - If the user is unable to add the Index to the list of Registered Courses because of a Timetable Clash between te Index and the Student's existing Indexes
      AlreadyRegisteredException - If the user is unable to add the Index because he has already Registered for the Course
